topic.title: ubuntu PPA ?
topic.body: is there any official PPA ? stable /testing PPA ?

topic.title: how you retake ownership of a zeroblog ?
topic.body: so lets say i want to retake ownership of a zeroblog if i lose my local copy and i still have the secretkey

topic.title: tor running but /Stats show mixed peers
topic.body: for some season when i look on /Stats there are some peers that are not TOR, why ?

1604065158_mirrored_dontspamm_github.body: oh that is very sad and bad move, PPA automate the update and make the install extremely easy, this is 2016 so if you want to grow the user base you need to have a PPA maybe you can talk to https://twitter.com/webupd8 to help you with the PPA
talking to webupb8 to make the PPA can help get even more users if he agrees to make the PPA the website gets allot of traffic
